data.title: Clark MP-40 Electric Pallet Jacks
data.meta-title: Used Clark MP-40 Electric Pallet Jacks
data.meta-description: Used Clark MP-40 Electric Pallet Jacks

ul.li: Lifts difficult loads easily with 4,000 lbs. of lifting capacity

long-description.p: With this Clark Electric Pallet Jack you can move your loads easily and securely with minimal effort from the operator. This unit has a 12V battery and comes with a charger as well.

This Clark Electric Pallet Jack is a very strong and durable unit to add to your facility's fleet. The unit weighs in at just 1,495 lbs. with the battery. It is the walk-behind style of electric pallet jack. The Clark can lift up to 4,0000 lbs up to 6" off of the floor. It has a standard fork size of 27" x 48" and runs off of a 12V battery system.

The handle on this unit is extremely functional and easy to use. With the easy to use controls the operator can go forward, backward and steer with ease. Additionally without being required to move your hand from the handle the operator can also raise and lower the forks. The design also allows for operation with either hand. The handle when raised vertically also acts a brake increasing safety.
